subject: Hockey, Ice

Coaches and Managers
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Lou Lamoriello, the Devils’ chief executive, president, general manager and interim coach, indicated that he planned to hire another coach after the end of the season.
snippet: Lou Lamoriello, the Devils’ chief executive, president, general manager and interim coach, indicated that he planned to hire another coach after the end of the season.
